fax_transmission_sheet.privileged_information: This is privileged and confidential information intended only for the use of the addressee(s) named above. If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended recipient(s), please note that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. Anyone who receives this communication in error should notify us immediately by telephone and return the original message to us at the above address via the U.S. Mail.
fax_transmission_sheet.confirmation_request: If checked, please confirm receipt with operator at 2077879384 or 213243-4032. If any problems, contact operator.
